# Aurora Borealis

Flowing, layered waves resembling northern lights.

## Settings

```
pattern: wave
waveFrequency: 4
waveAmplitude: 150
numPoints: 45
threshold: 7
thetaStep: 0.5
opacity: 0.4
colorMode: gradient
useCoarseBinning: false
useDynamicThreshold: false
useBlurring: true
blurRadius: 2
darkMode: true
```
